Developer Terms of Use
des: Get detailed business Info, Hours of operation, location, features and a properly articulated description of your business on Alexa. Secure your voice, your brand on voice, not a 3rd party listing, yours. It’s not just about having a presence on mobile, web and social, in an increasingly voice-first market. Your business needs to OWN YOUR NAME where customers are searching. With their voice. On Alexa.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
